item.title: Raichur district records 39.86% rabi sowing
item.description:
<![CDATA[Raichur district has recorded 39.86% sowing for the 2025-26 rabi season till Monday.
The target set for sowing is 1,33,955 hectares for the season, of which 53,398 hectares, (39.86%), have been covered so far.
According to sources in the Agriculture Department, sowing began by the start of November and it will continue till the second week of December.
